class_a_03_ecology_01:
Hello, hello. I hope everyone’s ready to learn
some new things today![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_02:
I seem to remember teaching you all about the
importance of Eggs in our last class together.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_03:
Ah, on that note, is everyone using their
Pokédex?[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_04:
It registers Pokémon born from Eggs as well as
those encountered via other methods, so don’t\r
you worry about that![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_05:
And, uh, hehe...just so you know, I’m the one who
developed the Pokédex app![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_06:
It was waaay before I started teaching here at the
academy, though.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_07: Back then, I was a researcher.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_08:
In fact, Director Clavell wasn’t working in
education at the time, either!\c
He was researching alongside me at the
same facility.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_09:
We got to research Pokémon together day in,
day out... Those sure were fun times.\c
I got yelled at all the time, though. Heh.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_10:
Wait a second, how did I get onto this?
Pretty sure I was talking about the Pokédex...[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_11:
Uh... Anyway! Today, I’d like to teach you about
catching Pokémon.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_12:
As you all know, a great way to catch a Pokémon
more easily is to first lower its HP.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_13:
But there’s another way to up your chances of a
successful catch. Can you guess what it is?[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_select_02: Inflict the Pokémon with a status condition
class_a_03_select_03: Prove you’re stronger than the Pokémon
class_a_03_ecology_answer_01:
Huh? Hmmm... Maybe that’s a bit of advice from
another region?\c
The common understanding here in Paldea may
be a little different.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_answer_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Wow! That’s right, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
Great job![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_answer_03:
That’s a rough-and-tumble way to look at things,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]...\c
I guess it’s true that sending out a strong
Pokémon can turn a battle in your favor, though.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_14:
The correct technique for making Pokémon easier
to catch is to inflict them with a status condition.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_15:
Sleep is an especially effective status condition.
It makes Pokémon drastically easier to catch![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_16:
If you have a Pokémon that can use moves that
put opponents to sleep, like Sleep Powder or\r
Hypnosis, filling up your Pokédex will be a cinch![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_17:
There are other ways to improve your catch rate
as well, like using Poké Balls specifically designed\r
to be effective against certain Pokémon.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_18:
Eating food that gives you Catching Power works,
too—or sneaking up on Pokémon from behind to\r
catch them by surprise when you start a battle![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_19:
If you’re having trouble, you may want to make
the rounds to the Gyms to get Gym Badges.[VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_20:
Earning Gym Badges will make it easier to catch
Pokémon of higher and higher levels![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_21:
Please do come show me your Pokédexes once
they start to fill up![VAR 0114(002A)]
class_a_03_ecology_22:
Another day, another enjoyable class. Oh yeah,
don’t forget—our next class will be a test![VAR 0114(002A)]
